verses.verse: A Psalm of David <WH1732>. Unto thee, O YY <WH3068>, do I lift up <WH5375> <WH8799> my soul <WH5315>.
O my 'Elohim <WH430>, I trust <WH982> <WH8804> in thee: let me not be ashamed <WH954> <WH8799>, let not mine enemies <WH341> <WH8802> triumph <WH5970> <WH8799> over me.
Yea, let none that wait <WH6960> <WH8802> on thee be ashamed <WH954> <WH8799>: let them be ashamed <WH954> <WH8799> which transgress <WH898> <WH8802> without cause <WH7387>.
Shew <WH3045> <WH8685> me thy ways <WH1870>, O YY <WH3068>; teach <WH3925> <WH8761> me thy paths <WH734>.
Lead <WH1869> <WH8685> me in thy truth <WH571>, and teach <WH3925> <WH8761> me: for thou art the 'Elohim <WH430> of my salvation <WH3468>; on thee do I wait <WH6960> <WH8765> all the day <WH3117>.
Remember <WH2142> <WH8798>, O YY <WH3068>, thy tender mercies <WH7356> and thy lovingkindnesses <WH2617>; for they have been ever of old <WH5769>.

Remember <WH2142> <WH8799> not the sins <WH2403> of my youth <WH5271>, nor my transgressions <WH6588>: according to thy mercy <WH2617> remember <WH2142> <WH8798> thou me for thy goodness <WH2898> ' sake, O YY <WH3068>.
Good <WH2896> and upright <WH3477> is the YY <WH3068>: therefore will he teach <WH3384> <WH8686> sinners <WH2400> in the way <WH1870>.
The meek <WH6035> will he guide <WH1869> <WH8686> in judgment <WH4941>: and the meek <WH6035> will he teach <WH3925> <WH8762> his way <WH1870>.
All the paths <WH734> of the YY <WH3068> are mercy <WH2617> and truth <WH571> unto such as keep <WH5341> <WH8802> his covenant <WH1285> and his testimonies <WH5713>.
For thy name's <WH8034> sake, O YY <WH3068>, pardon <WH5545> <WH8804> mine iniquity <WH5771>; for it is great <WH7227>.
What man <WH376> is he that feareth <WH3373> the YY <WH3068>? him shall he teach <WH3384> <WH8686> in the way <WH1870> that he shall choose <WH977> <WH8799>.
His soul <WH5315> shall dwell <WH3885> <WH8799> at ease <WH2896>; and his seed <WH2233> shall inherit <WH3423> <WH8799> the earth <WH776>.
The secret <WH5475> of the YY <WH3068> is with them that fear <WH3373> him; and he will shew <WH3045> <WH8687> them his covenant <WH1285>.
Mine eyes <WH5869> are ever <WH8548> toward the YY <WH3068>; for he shall pluck <WH3318> <WH8686> my feet <WH7272> out of the net <WH7568>.
Turn <WH6437> <WH8798> thee unto me, and have mercy <WH2603> <WH8798> upon me; for I am desolate <WH3173> and afflicted <WH6041>.
The troubles <WH6869> of my heart <WH3824> are enlarged <WH7337> <WH8689>: O bring thou me out <WH3318> <WH8685> of my distresses <WH4691>.
Look <WH7200> <WH8798> upon mine affliction <WH6040> and my pain <WH5999>; and forgive <WH5375> <WH8798> all my sins <WH2403>.
Consider <WH7200> <WH8798> mine enemies <WH341> <WH8802>; for they are many <WH7231> <WH8804>; and they hate <WH8130> <WH8804> me with cruel <WH2555> hatred <WH8135>.
O keep <WH8104> <WH8798> my soul <WH5315>, and deliver <WH5337> <WH8685> me: let me not be ashamed <WH954> <WH8799>; for I put my trust <WH2620> <WH8804> in thee.
Let integrity <WH8537> and uprightness <WH3476> preserve <WH5341> <WH8799> me; for I wait <WH6960> <WH8765> on thee.
Redeem <WH6299> <WH8798> Yisra'EL <WH3478>, O 'Elohim <WH430>, out of all his troubles <WH6869>.
